content:
# The error indicates that I don't have any iron ore left in my inventory to insert into the furnace. This is surprising since I initially had 5 iron ore, but it seems I may have extracted all of it during the previous operations.

# To continue production, I need to gather more iron ore. I'll move to the nearest iron ore patch and harvest additional ore.

iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)  # Find the nearest iron ore patch
move_to(iron_ore_position)  # Move to the iron ore position
harvest_resource(iron_ore_position, quantity=10)  # Harvest more iron ore

# After gathering more iron ore, I'll check the updated inventory.
print(f"Updated Inventory after harvesting more iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Verify the inventory after harvesting.
